parameters.name: BASENAME
parameters.description: The basename assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: SUFFIX
parameters.description: A suffix to be appended to the basename of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.description: The tag given to the built image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the  source image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the source image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the source image.
